data.title: Always a wait to be served
data.text: I don't go here often but when I do the wait is ridiculous. There could be one person ahead of you and your there for 30 minutes. Some of the servers have an attitude as though they are doing you a favor. I can't believe they are still around. Also there is no parking on this street.

data.title: Dinner menu
data.text:
I have the red pea soup and the ox tails  and beans both dinner was very delicious  
Great value for money

data.title: Great Chicken Patties
data.text: My daughter loves this restaurant, she says that they have the best chicken patties in Westchester County.

data.title: NEW ROCHELLE LOCATION is HORRIBLE!!!!
data.text: DO NOT EAT FROM HERE! I was served white rice that had to be at least a week old, it was like the scrapping of the bottom of the rice pot and the plantains were hard as a rock! I ordered the food and the guy either assumed I was taking it out, or that since I wasn't of a specific ethnic group that I wouldn't know what Caribbean food is, so he dumped the old SH!$ that I wouldn't give to a dog, I should report them to the health department, but I actually sat down to eat. I sat there and watched them serve "preferred" customers food that came out fresh from the kitchen. I even mentioned to the guy that the rice was so old they really shouldn't be serving it, and that the plantains were hard as a rock, and instead of expressing any kind of business ethic and pacify me with perhaps offering me some fresh plantains he just pretended to not hear me.

data.title: Their oxtail AMAZING
data.text: It was my first time going actually inside a golden crust. I have so many by my house but never cared to go inside and check their food out. I always love oxtail and when I got there I ordered oxtail. After I tried it it felt like like heaven on hearth, Yes it was that delicious.
